reviews.comments: Muy comodo el lugar! Me encantó. Muy  linda la decoracion y todos los espacios bien distribuidos. El balcón le da un toque especial. Me volveria a quedar sin dudarlo
El dpto es muy cómodo y lindo, tiene buena ubicación y Brian es muy amable y flexible con los horarios check in y out !
El duplex de Brian es realmente muy cómodo. En una zona súper tranquila y de fácil acceso. Brian es muy amable y está siempre atento, sin invadir. Nos sentimos como en casa.

Fuimos con mi esposa y mis dos hijos de escapada a BsAs. Muy buena ubicación, zona tranquila y linda de recorrer.
El departamento es como se ve en las fotos, fue muy cómodo para nosotros.
Brian fue muy flexible con el horario de llegada (nos retrasamos en el viaje) y también lo fue en el horario de salida.
Hasta la próxima!
todo exelente

Por el valor, la ubicación y la atención se puede conseguir algo mejor por la zona, inclusive Palermo Soho o Hollywood.
Viajo cada dos meses a Buenos Aires usando siempre AirBnB y debo decir que en ésta ocasión no fue la mejor experiencia.
La casa no está en las condiciones de las fotos. Te dejo mis sugerencias en privado para que puedas mejorarlo.
Cualquier duda/consulta estoy a disposicion
reviews.response:
entiendo tu enojo luego de que te haga pagar las toallas que dejaste llenas de maquillajes. No suelo hacerlo pero en este caso el maquillaje que usaste no salio.
de todas maneras gracias..

reviews.comments: Muy bien en general . Llegada cómoda salida también

Fuimos con mi mujer, mi hijo y otra pareja y la verdad es que nos sentimos muy a gusto con el duplex y su ubicacion. Estabamos cerca de las zonas que queriamos recorrer. Ademas este dpto era tal cual el anuncio. Muy lindo.
Braian nos recibio bien y sugirio varios lugares para hacer mas amena nuestra estadia.
El departamento es muy lindo y comodo y se encuentra muy bien ubicado. Es tal como se ve en las fotos. Brian fue un excelente anfitrion.

Brian nos estaba esperando a la hora pactada. Fue muy cordial. Nos explico todo lo referido al dpto, q es genial. Muy acogedor. Bien equipada la cocina. Y bien ubicado para pasear a diferentes puntos de Capital. 
Al Check Out no hubo ni un drama y tambien estuvo al horario pactado.
Respondio los (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) al instante y se mostro siempre con excelente predisposicion
El dpto es HERMOSO. Desde la ubicación , las comodidades y la amabilidad del dueño de casa. Lo recomiendo, sin lugar a duda mi próxima estadía en buenos aires será allí
Hermoso departamento, muy bien amueblado, cálido y con todo lo necesario para una hermosa estadía, super recomendable. gracias!!
Brian fue muy atento y con una pronta respuesta a nuestros requerimientos, haciendo que la estadía en el comodisimo depto, sea sumamente agradable, adaptandose a nuestras necesidades.

En el caso de mis acompañantes y el mío pudimos disfrutar de que Brian fuera atento en el trato y puntual en los compromisos. Nos sentimos en casa principalmente porque no nos faltó nada que hayamos necesitado y fuera razonable incluir en una vivienda de alquiler, todo los artefactos funcionaron perfectamente y la limpieza fue intachable, a lo que debe añadirse la decoración cálida, balanceada y original.
Buenisimo el duplex. Tal cual las fotos del anuncio. Excelente anfitrion. Volveremos :)

Brian estuvo todo el tiempo al servicio y mostrando proactividad para asegurar que el inquilino se encuentre en total comodidad. El departamento es hermoso, la parrilla es excelente para hacer un exquisito asado. Muy recomendable

El departamento es muy cómodo, muy lindo y es igual a las fotos,  la ubicación muy buena. Nos hubiera gustado disfrutarlo más! Tiene absolutamente todas las comodidades, super iluminado. La atención de Brian fue excelente. Muy recomendable! Seguramente volveremos pronto.
Excelente todo. Buen barrio, tranquilidad, seguridad, bohemio.  Recomendamos absolutamente.  Gracias
Brian me ha recibido muy correctanente y puntual , el duplex es hermoso y acojedor

El departamento es muy cómodo, luminoso y lindo. Es tal cual como se encuentra en las fotos, pero las terrazas son aún mejores. 
Brian es un anfitrión buenísimo y muy flexible.

Muchas gracias, por la linda estadía!
Linda casa con excelente ubicación, todo en órden. Muy recomendable!

El departamento es precioso, tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy cómodo para 3 o 4 personas y con dos ambientes separados. Esta bien equipado y se encuentra en una zona residencial a solo dos pasos de muchos restaurantes y cafes de la zona de palermo hollywood. Brian ademas es un excelente host que se acomodó a nuestro horario de llegada (630pm) y nos permitió hacer el check out mas tarde también el día Domingo. 
Lo recomendaría 100% y a nosotros nos encantaría volver a quedarnos ahi.

La casa de Brian esta muy bien! La distribución de la vivienda: la habitación de arriba, la sala de estar y cocina en la planta baja, con balcones en ambas plantas, era perfecto para nuestra estancia. Me gustó especialmente las sábanas y toallas, muy blancos! Todo estaba muy limpio. La zona es muy agradable, pero tranquila, algo que se aprecia en Buenos Aires.
Brian estuvo muy servicial con respecto al check in y check out y él respondió a nuestras preguntas muy rápidamente y de manera eficiente. Un lugar para recomendar definitivamente.

La maison de Brian est très bien ! La distribution de l’appartement : la chambre en haut, le salon et cuisine en bas avec des balcons dans les deux étages, était parfaite pour notre séjour. J’ai apprécié en particulier les draps des lits et les serviettes, très blanches ! Tout était très propre. Le quartier est très sympa mais calme, chose qui s’apprécie à Buenos Aires.
Brian a été très accommodant vis à vis des horaires du check in et check out et il a répondu à nos questions très rapidement et efficacement. Une adresse à recommander certainement.

Brian, ha sido un excelente gestor del departamento. DEsde el primer momento muy comunicativo y receptivo. 
Esta bien ubicado, tiene una cocina equipada y un comfortable espacio. 
Lo recomiendo.

El duplex es muy cómodo y está bien equipado. La ubicación es muy buena y tranquila.

La comunicación con Brian fue muy buena. Teniendo en cuenta que nuestro barco se retrasó y terminamos llegando 4 horas más tarde de lo esperado, no tuvo problema con eso.

Muy buen departamento para quedarse a 5 minutos caminando a zona de restaurantes y cafés en Palermo Hollywood.

Respecto a la atención de Brian, siempre estuvo atento y cordial con nosotros.  Tuvimos solo un inconveniente con el agua caliente el primer día, pero se lo hicimos saber y lo soluciono al instante.

Totalmente recomendado.
Todo salió como lo planeamos, el dpto es tal cual las fotos, nos sentimos en casa y nos encanto el barrio.
Excelente ubicación e instalaciones

Excelente experiencia! Brian fue sumamente amable, el departamento está súper bonito y de acuerdo a la descripción y las fotos. la ubicación esta muy bien también, a unas cuadras del metro te permite moverte por la ciudad cómodamente y de forma segura.

Nuestra estadía en este departamento fue excelente! Brian nos dio flexibilidad con la hora de entrada y salida, lo cual ayudó mucho para poder acomodarnos a nuestros horarios.
El departamento es súper confortable y cómodo y estaba equipado con todo lo que necesitamos para sentirnos como en casa. Está ubicado en un barrio muy tranquilo aunque muy cerca de bares y restaurantes.
Definitivamente volveríamos a rentarlo en visitas futuras a Buenos Aires.
En general todo estuvo muy bien, el apartamento es muy agradable y Brian fue muy amable. La ubicación está bastante bien, es un barrio tranquilo y tiene varios restaurantes cerca.

Excelente ubicación en el barrio de Palermo, un lugar ideal para pasar varios días y sentirse como en casa. El departamento esta totalmente equipado y las fotos lo describen perfectamente. 
Diego nos brindo toda su ayuda y siempre fue muy cordial con nosotros. Gracias por todo.

Espectacular todo! el apartamento tal cual se muestra en las fotos, super cómodo. Viajamos junto a 3 amigos en un viaje para salir en la noche poder ir de compras y pasear tranquilos y el apartamento se ubicaba espectacular para lo que buscábamos, muy cerca de todo y  con comodidades cerca. El anfitrión un genio, el ultimo día nuestro barco salia  a las 00hs y como no tenia el apto alquilado nos dejo quedarnos hasta mas tarde para no andar por la calle con todas las cosas. Sin palabras. Recomendable 100%

El depto. es muy cómodo , la zona muy tranquila y Brian fue muy amable. 
No tuvimos ningún inconveniente !! lo recomiendo.
El apartamento es muy mono y está muy bien situado. Gracias Brian

La descripción de la casa y el barrio cumplieron perfectamente. Muy lindo departamento para quedarse en Buenos Aires, Brian siempre estuvo atento a todo.
Excelente.
El departamento es muy cómodo, lindo como vemos en las imágenes, y la ubicación muy buena. Nos hubiera gustado disfrutarlo más! La coordinación con Brian fue excelente. Muy recomendable!

Brian nos recibió con una gran sonrisa y calidez. Nos dio consejos sobre lugares para visitar y cómo llegar hasta ellos. El departamento es tal cual se describe, los espacios son amplios y luminosos, las camas cómodas, el lugar está limpio y como nuevo. Además, la decoración se nota hasta en los detalles. Nos pareció un lugar encantador, cómodo, seguro y en una hermosa zona de la encantadora ciudad de Buenos Aires.

Brian es super atento y esta siempre en contacto, el departamento muy bueno, super cómodo, tiene todo lo que se puede necesitar para vivir como en casa.

Ir y regresar en taxi puede tener sus complicaciones, pues la ubicación es en el limite de Colegiales y Palermo, ademas muy cerca atraviesa la vía del tren cortando la calle. En ocasiones hemos dado varias vueltas hasta lograr llegar (estar preparados para dar indicaciones al taxi).

En los alrededores hay de todo, lugares buenos para comer, markets, una estación de Subte, la parada de un colectivo que va por la zona mas céntrica de Palermo, etc.

Recomiendo totalmente, y si claro volvería a rentar el depto de Brian. :)
Muy lindo apartamento, buena distribución y estupenda piscinita para sortear el calor de Buenos Aires en verano. Muy fácil la comunicación con Brian

Nuestra experiencia con Brian y su apartamento lindo fue maravillosa! Brian es muy amable y nos ayudó bastante. Su apartamento es bien lindo y situado en un área central, cerca de muchas tiendas y restaurantes. Gracias por todo, Brian!
reviews.response: gracias mary! hope to see you guys again! thanks!

reviews.comments: Y bueno, baires es una cuidad maravillosa y en particular el hecho de habernos quedado en el departamento de Brian fue un gran acierto. El departamento es tal cual como se ve en las fotos, muy comodo y acogedor, ubicado extraordinariamente bien, con muchos lugares para ir comer, tomarse algo o bien ir de compras. El subte esta muy cerca y es muy facil moverse desde ahi al resto de la ciudad. Brain es una gran persona y desde hoy gran amigo, sumamente atento, transparente y responsable no solo en lo que respecta al alquiler del departamento, si no de todo lo que implica la experiencia de visitar Buenos Aires. Yo lo recomiendo en un 100%.
reviews.response:
Rodrigo mil gracias a uds!! la verdad a sido un placer alojarlos!  espero vuelvan pronto y sino nos veremos en chile!
abz!
brian

reviews.comments: Great host and beautiful apartment well located in palermo hollywood. Brian is available for local advise and works with for a great stay in buenos aires. Highly recommended.

Brian was a superb host and the apartment was perfect for my boyfriend and my stay.  We were able to go grocery shopping at a super market about 4 blocks away and were able to make our breakfasts and dinners at the apartment and also go to Oui Oui a cute little breakfast nook a block away.  The place was nice and warm and the bed was comfortable.  Thank you Brian!
reviews.response: thanks sara!!  thanks for the recomendations!

reviews.comments: Amazing apartment in Palermo. In love with it...:-)

We really enjoyed staying at Brian’s place, it’s clean and comfortable. A hummingbird feeds from the flowers on the lower balcony. It’s on a quiet corner but you can walk to good bars and restaurants easily. There are shops all around and the underground trains and buses are just up the road. The area is leafy and safe. Palermo soho is only 15 mins walk but it’s actually nicer to stay here just outside all that hubbub.
Nice apartment, subway a couple of blocks away. Good restaurants in the neighbourhood. We enjoyed our stay in this lovely cozy house!
O apartamento é tal e qual está nas fotos. Está muito bem localizado perto de restaurantes, bares e supermercados. Numa próxima oportunidade retornaríamos.

We had a really nice stay at Brians Place. It is not directly in the hip center of Palermo but in a really calm and also nice neighbourhood in walking distance to all the cool places. We felt very safe and comfortable. Nothing to complain here!

Charming apartment, wonderful location, spend time in the hammock--you won't regret it. An adorable playground with street art commemorating the Falklands conflict is less than 2 blocks away for families. Brian met us to check us in and kindly arranged transport both ways from the airport. Very responsive the couple of times we had questions.

reviews.response:
Lamento mucho tus comentarios pero entiendo que todo esto viene por no haberte dado el descuento descomunal que pedias mas todas las otras cosas que exigias al llegar. gracias a dios hay otras personas que dicen la verdad y son mas coherentes a la hora de negociar. Tambien lamento que no uses correctamente los medios de internet y que hayamos tenido tantos problemas de comunicacion por tu culpa! 
Suerte en el futuro y te recomiendo un hotel 5 estrellas ( ahi tampoco se puede negociar el precio) olvidate

reviews.comments: Nossa estada em Buenos Aires foi muito boa. O apartamento estava limpo e era muito bem localizado, com excelentes bares e restaurantes à distância de uma caminhada! Recomendo!
Great stay! I recommend it!

Beautiful apartment with 2 balconies. Really spacious with a homey feel. The hammock on the balcony is amazing. Absolutely great. Close to everything and walking distance to lots of wonderful restaurant's and bars. Highly highly recommend!
Really great apartment.  Walking distance to everything you'd need.  Brian was very accommodating and communicative.
Really great place. The two terraces are perfect. Nice location and excellent communication. Would recommend staying here.

This was a great apartment, the only problem was washing our clothes and drying them on the first day to find some sort of cleaning residue on the counters( where we were drying clothes.. the apartment was really great though and comunication was fantastic... subte is far from the apartment( about 1 mile) if you are looking to maximize time
reviews.response: subway is 5 blocks! dont understand what problem you had with the washing.. you want me to buy the soap for you?

reviews.comments: The apartment is beautiful as described... located at walking distance from many bars and restaurants. Definitely recommend this place.

Overall, i had a very good experience. I booked another place from Brain last year. He's very correct and 'professional'. The place was exactly as the pictures shows. The apto is big, there's a lot of natural light comming in and space to do barbecue and a balcony to chill out during night.
The location could be better. I was with my little daugther (3years) and my wife and it was needed to use more Uber (taxi is very expensive!) than we'd like to get to another areas in Buenos Aires, like shoppings, parks, other neighborhoods. It is the limit between Palermo and Los Colegiales. However, the place is quiet and safe. By 2-3 blocks walking, you will have access to several markets, Deli's, cafeterias, restaurants and general services. 
As a reference, you will be located 20" walking distance from Distrito Arcos and Museo de la Ciência.
I do recommend.

Un hote au top disponible pour toute nos demandes nous il nous a meme fait du change a un taux meilleur que la rue appartement très propre place en plein coeur de palermo le metro et la la rue centrale sont a 500m je recommande cet appartement a tout les europeen vous serez bien recu
Superb little apartment, perfect location for exploring.
We really enjoyed our stay. Brian was very helpful and responded quickly always. The neighborhood was quiet and a good location. Thanks for being a great host!

We arrived late, and Brian's girlfriend was kind enough to wait around for us. The apartment looks better than the pictures: it's very comfortable. Great part of town too: very close to the heart of  Palermo so it's easy to go out (& stumble home), but with just enough distance to mean you won't be kept up on off nights.

We were met by a very good taxi service at the airport and taken quickly to the flat . There we were met by Mariela one of the partners . It was a good welcome and we settled in well . However Mariela was not able to find the wifi code which we found later ourselves. We were not told how to operate the boiler at first but we were shown after a day . The upstairs toilet seat was a bit loose and neither toilet seat was suitable for a man standing as the seats did not go back far enough . Otherwise I would recommend the flat and its quiet location . It is also within easy reach of Colegiales Station and Avenida Cabildo
Brian was very friendly and very flexible with our check in check out requirements and everything ! Definitely my first choice if i ever get back to Palermo !
A really great duplex apartment in quiet street of BA. Perfect a couple and even for a family or 4 friends. Ample living space and private balconies. High recommend.

Brian's place is my favorite apartment out of the 3 I've stayed at so far in and around Palermo in Buenos Aires.  Brian is a great host and was very helpful.

The outdoor space was great.  I especially used the parilla alot and cooked a great lomo!  The deck and small pool were nice as well.  The apartment is well decorated and feels like a home, not a bare model that was set up just to rent. I think this adds to the relaxing appeal of the apartment.  Also, I liked that it is located on a quiet street but still close to everything and convenient to all Palermo has to offer.

O apartamento é confortável, possui bom espaço para 4 pessoas. A mini-piscina é divertida para usufruir com a família. A localização é ok. Pontos a serem melhorados: o banheiro ficou com cheiro de esgoto no final do último dia e no check-out sugerimos ao Brian para deixar as malas no apartamento enquanto chamaríamos um táxi (a rua é deserta, não passa taxi e é necessário caminhar de 2 a 3 quarteirões) e o anfitrião disse que não, que teríamos que ir com as malas caminhando. Brian poderia ter sido mais receptivo. No todo foi boa a estadia, sem grandes problemas.
reviews.response:
brigado maity, no pense que querian dejar laas maletas realmente.Lo unico que les intente decir es que lleven sus maletas asi el taxi no les cobraba ir a buscarlas. lo siento si no entendieron bien.
saludos

reviews.comments:
We never met Brian, but his friend who let us in the apartment was very kind. The apartment it self was nice and clean and has two floors each with a small terrace.The terraces were however quite worn and could use some maintenance. The plants out there were also in great need of some care and one could sense that this wasn't somebody's home but a rental place.

The street was a little bit dodgy and in fact on the boarder between Palermo Hollywood and Collegiales. There were a few nice cafes two blocks away, but you're quite a walk from eg. Palermo Soho if you don't have a bike.
reviews.response: summer is hard here, thats the reason of the plants.. to bad you couldnt find your self at the neighbour. everybody does. thanks anyway

reviews.comments: The apartment is very beautiful and clean, the airconditioner are really necessary during the summer. The neighborhood is very nice, lots of restaurants, pubs and supermarkets. Brian wasn't there to welcome us, but his friend where and we had no problems at all. I would recomend this place for anyone who enjoy the good food in the Palermo area and is really easy to go downtown.

We spent a very happy Christmas at the apartment. Just as described, the apartment has lots of personality and is a fun place to stay. Most important, when little things went wrong (a problem with the hot water) Brian was there to fix it in 20 mins!! He was also full of useful advice when needed. Thank you!
Perfect apartment, very nice host. Very accomodant with our backpacks and everything in general, gave us lots of good tips. All in all, great stay !!
We loved the location and the apartment. Very spacious. We spent a lot of time on the patios. Brian was very helpful and responsive. We would definitely stay here again.

Brian's place was a wonderful welcome to Buenos Aires.  Loved the space of the apartment and the outdoor terraces.  

He was very attentive and took care of all of our questions prior and during arrival.  It was a great trip.

Leiligheten var som forventet ut fra bildene. Beliggenheten er ok, men området i den umiddelbare nærheten er noe preget av fattigdom. 
Brian var punktlig og ryddig. Vi mistet elektrisiteten i nesten et døgn, og Brian var da relativt behjelpelig, men tilbød ingen avslag på pris.
reviews.response:
julius, lamento  lo de la electricidad, ofreceria un descuento si el corte se hubiese dado por las instalaciones del departamento. Este fue un caso que excede al departamento ya que como vos sabes hubieron varios vecinos sin electricidad por culpa de este corte.
saludos

reviews.comments: I had a great stay at Brian's apartment. It was a beautiful spot as pictured, in a great neighborhood, and he was really helpful and friendly. He  I'd definitely stay again.

Brian was great. He was very helpful and arranged taxi service to and from the airport. The apartment was in a great location and very clean.  Close to the subway and easy to get a taxi. The apartment is located in a quiet area but the nightlife is only a 5 minute walk away. Loved Buenos Aires and would stay here again.

Our location was ideal to get around town...access to the subway and places to eat, lots of walking options. Brian was helpful and arranged a taxi for us and helped us with exchanging currency. Thanks for everything.

Excellent experience!. Brian is lovely and helpful. He organized my arrival with a taxi waiting for me at Ezeiza. The apartment  is different due to colors, decoration. It is nice. It is located close to beautiful places but 
keeping 3 blocks distance so you do not hear a sound... Perfect to sleep.. Pictures from apartment are accurate. There are only two units in the building and you access by stairs. Thank you Brian!. Check in and check out was flexible.

Passei 7 dias com meu namorado no apartamento e adoramos. Tudo muito limpo, arejado e aconchegante, nos sentimos em casa. O apartamento é bem localizado e conseguimos fazer muitas coisas por lá a pé. Vale muito a pena o investimento. O Brian foi super legal com a gente, nos deu varias dicas da cidade e do bairro.

It was the second time that we rented an appartment from Brian in Buenos Aires. It is an excellent choice, we had a wonderful time in the appartment , the nice and quiet neighborhood and in BA. The appartment met all the promises that were made and Brian was very wellcoming and responsive to our needs. We will definately come back. Muchas gracias!!

Brian was a wonderful host. He welcomed us into his home on time and ensured we had everything we needed.
The house itself was beautiful and perfect in size for 4 people.
Great parrella too!
Overall a fantastic stay.

Brian was an amazing host.  I was waylayed due to a volcanoand needed a place to stay on very short notice.  Brian responded to my request very quickly, and was also very accomodating with an early check in time.  The apartment was perfect,exactly as he has advertised, the neighbourhood is great and it was the perfect place to spend my bonus days in BuenosAires.  
Brian also helped organized my trip to the airport when it was time to go.  So seamless and easy!  I will definitely look to stay here next time I am in town and will recommend Brian as a host to anyone I know visiting this amazing city.
reviews.response: many thanks colleen! hope to see you soon !

reviews.comments: Apartamento igual as fotos! Local de facil acesso a bares e restaurantes,distante do centro de buenos aires. Tivemos problema com agua quente no primeiro dia, mas foi solucionado no segundo dia, pagamos a mais por sair as 19h.

Brian is such a nice guy! Very helpful and always available to assist me before and during my visit. The flat is really nice and well located. I highly recommend Brian as a host and specially this apartment. Will be back for sure :)

This apartment is great! Located very close to the cafes and shops in Palermo Hollywood. Brian has a lot of great resources nearby - several convenience shops and free, fast Wi-Fi. It is a bit hard to explain where it is if you speak broken Spanish like me, but it was easy to find as long as you made it to the intersection of Dorrego y Nicaragua. My only problem was that I couldn't stay longer!

Brian was a very helpful host, arranging for our taxi on our arrival, meeting us at the flat, exchanging money and taking us on a get oriented tour of the neighborhood.  He recommended great places to eat nearby.  The flat was as pictured and perfect for our needs.

Brian was a great host, very attentive with questions before the trip and helpful in arranging transport from the airport for me and my husband, and taking the time to walk around the neighbourhood to point out various things (groceries, cafés, etc). 
We had 2 weeks at the apartment and did a lot of walking around the area. 
The area itself is very quiet, on the edge of Palermo Hollywood, but still within walking distance to restaurants and bars, but further from the more densely populated streets for restaurants/bars at night. We walked an average 15-20 mins to get to a restaurant in the area at night. The subte (subway system) is close by and easy to use - Brian provided a card to use for our stay that we added money to quite easily at a kiosk or at the station. 
The apartment is spacious, well laid out, and is as the photos show.

Brian's appartment is nice and confortable. All the beds are confortable, the air conditioning and the wifi works well and the univeral plug in the living room was very usefull for us. The neighborhood is quiet and safe. To take a taxi you walk just a pair of blocks, and its easy also to get the subway. There are some cafés in the area, a bakery shop (patisserie) and some little nice stores a few blocks away. We were a family of 4 and we had a very good experience in the appartment and at the city!

Great apartment. Very helpfull host. Although we didn't meet Brian in person, he arranged everything for us to have a good time in his place. 
The apartment was exactly as described, very clean, with all the utilities we needed to get by, including bedsheets, towels, etc (everything clean and in good conditions).
Special plus to the little pool on the balcony (with hot/cold water) where we spent many of our nights relaxing after a day of sightseeing.
I'd definitely stay there again and recomend it to my friends!
Brian, thanks for everything!
reviews.response: many thanks renata! so glad you have a good time! hope to see you next time!

reviews.comments: My boyfriend and I truly enjoyed our stay at Brian's apartment. Brian was very responsive to anything we needed. The apartment is gorgeous. The neighborhood is on the outskirts of Palermo, but everything you need is a short cab ride away. It's a nice neighborhood but wasn't what we expected in terms of Palermo. There's a great little French cafe a few blocks away called Oui Oui which was very yummy. If you prefer being a little bit out of the way of all the action, we definitely recommend Brian's apartment!
The host was nice and helpful. He fixed all the problems that arose. The apartment is just as pictured and we had a very nice stay.
Brian was a great host and very communicative. The apartment was exactly as described and I highly recommend the nearby cafe oui oui!
reviews.response: thanks meghan! hope to see you again!

reviews.comments:
Overall we were really satisfied with Brian's apartment. In particular we liked: 
-Large apartment with two balconies
-Walking distance to subway
-Quiet neighborhood
-Several restaurants and cafes in the area
-Friendly host
 
There were a few minor things that could have been improved in terms of amenities, but we've let Brian know so hopefully they get addressed. One minor issue that occurred: We notified Brian that the hair dryer wasn’t working, and he said he would replace it. Maybe he has since, but he didn't replace it in the several remaining days we were there.
Brian's apartment is huge and perfect for a long stay, it's in a super convenient location and near Oui Oui the best cafe in Palermo! Brian is a great helpful resource for all things Buenos Aires.

Excelente anfitrião, completamente disposto a nos ajudar, nos recebeu bem demais, honesto e compromissado com os hóspedes. 
Confiável 100%. 
Apartamento exatamente como o descrito no site. 
Bairro excelente, de alto nível, ótimos restaurantes por perto. Ótimas padarias e lanchonetes. Bairro com bastante opções gastronômicas, grande fluxo de taxi na rua paralela ao do apartamento (rua dorrego). 

Não ficamos hospedados todo o tempo contratado devido a motivos pessoais, preferimos ficar no centro da cidade junto com parentes, pois ficaria distante para fazer programação juntos. 

Recomendo o anfitrião, o bairro e o apartamento.

Brian foi super solícito e atencioso, desde a chegada até o retorno! O apartamento é muito aconchegante e, apesar de não ser tão próximo ao centro, é muito prático de taxi. Nos arredores do apartamento há vários bons restaurantes e cafés.

HIGLEY RECOMMENDED. The appartment was located in a good neighboorhood. City centre easy reachable by metro. Spacious rooms with two teracces. One with barbeque and another one with small simmingpool. Fantastic surplus as we were travelling as a couple with a child of 3 years old. Brian was a helpfull host, present whenever there was a problem. Brian helped us to get from the airport to get to the app as well as to get a better exhange rate at the blue market wich saved us quiete some money. Washingmachine and boiler everything was functioning as supposed to  . You have a super bistro two blocks away called the Oui Oui to enjoy a superb breakfast to start your day.     We can HIGLEY RECOMMEND this offer. Thanks Brian to help us enjoy our stay for a week in Buenos Aires.  Grtz from Tore, Lies y Jacob
Brian was very helpful and even took the time to give us a mini tour of the neighborhood. The apartment was clean and comfortable. I recommend staying here!

Well what to say about Brian and his apartment?? Only good stuff!

First of all, Brian was a superb helpful  host, whom made everything easy about our stay in Buenos Aires. He gladly helped us with any questions and concerns we experienced during our stay. He managed to make us feel really secure.

Thank you Brian! Hope to meet you another time!

The apartment was perfectly located near nice cafés, public transportarion and grossery stores.
It was clean and very cosy to live in.
All in all the whole experience was perfect!
